## Source: ossf-package-analysis (85d874a8f30a59e38efbecbbbbf4fbcd3aea138cc89bf3d60f1085c252434b85)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'zoomapps-texteditor-vuejs' @ 1.0.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
